headline: Union Pacific CEO: Trump 'sees the value' of $85 billion Norfolk Southern deal
summary: Union Pacific CEO Jim Vena is all in to pitch the biggest deal of his career to investors — and to President Trump.

raw.headline: Union Pacific CEO: Trump 'sees the value' of $85 billion Norfolk Southern deal
raw.summary: Union Pacific CEO Jim Vena is all in to pitch the biggest deal of his career to investors — and to President Trump.

headline: Union Pacific CEO talks US innovation, Norfolk Southern deal
summary: Union Pacific (UNP) CEO Jim Vena sits down with Yahoo Finance executive editor Brian Sozzi at the Ford Pro Accelerate forum to discuss the railroad operator's workforce, President Trump's vision for US manufacturing, and the company's $85 billion deal with Norfolk Southern (NSC). Also catch Brian Sozzi's full interview with Ford (F) CEO Jim Farley. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

headline: Canadian Pacific Banks on Dividends Amid Freight Challenges

headline: BNSF to shippers: Speak up about UP-NS merger
summary: BNSF Railway states that Union Pacific's deal to acquire Norfolk Southern will hurt rail competition, increase rates, reduce service, and likely lead to operational issues. The post BNSF to shippers: Speak up about UP-NS merger appeared first on FreightWaves.
